body: If your looking for Translation of this book ot is available in mobile app: https://mgemobile.page.link/invites Or search the play store for MgeMobile

For all of those who are looking for translations of the other world guides Monster Girls Redux have them (you'll need to register to see it)
The book presented here is the MGE World Guide Side II: http://monstergirlsredux.com/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=1590
For the main guides themselves 
I
http://monstergirlsredux.com/viewforum.php?f=11
II
http://monstergirlsredux.com/viewforum.php?f=12
III
http://monstergirlsredux.com/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=1590
Is there anyone who can translate all of this? Anyone knows if KenKou will make a translated version?
I want this to be translated so bad.
